properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station...
properties.longDescription: This beautiful family home offers spacious accommodation throughout, featuring a welcoming entrance hall, large living room with bay window, modern fitted kitchen/dining room with direct access to the garden, and a downstairs cloakroom. The first floor comprises three good-sized bedrooms and a family bathroom. The property benefits from a well-maintained rear garden, off-street parking, and a garage.
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description: Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat...
properties.longDescription: A stunning ground floor apartment offering contemporary living at its finest. The property comprises a spacious open-plan living/dining area, high-specification kitchen with integrated appliances, two double bedrooms (master with en-suite), and a modern family bathroom. Additional benefits include a private garden, allocated parking, and a share of freehold.

properties.description: Luxury five bedroom detached home in a sought-after location, with a large garden and swimming pool...
properties.longDescription: An impressive detached residence offering exceptional family accommodation. Features include a grand reception hall, three reception rooms, a stunning kitchen/breakfast room, utility room, and a home office. The first floor offers five bedrooms, three with en-suite facilities, and a family bathroom. The property boasts a heated swimming pool, landscaped gardens, and a double garage.

properties.description: A modern one bedroom flat with great views, perfect for a single professional or couple...
properties.longDescription: A stylish one-bedroom apartment situated on the 4th floor of this modern development. The property features an open-plan living/kitchen area with floor-to-ceiling windows, a double bedroom with built-in wardrobes, and a contemporary bathroom. Benefits include a balcony with city views, concierge service, and secure parking.

properties.description: Beautiful four-bedroom family home with spacious rooms and a large garden...
properties.longDescription: A substantial family home offering versatile living accommodation. The ground floor comprises a welcoming hallway, dual-aspect living room, dining room, study, and a modern kitchen/family room. Upstairs features four double bedrooms, with the master having an en-suite, and a family bathroom. The property benefits from a south-facing garden and off-street parking.

properties.description: Spacious three-bedroom flat located in a popular area, with parking space and easy access to public transport...
properties.longDescription: An exceptional three-bedroom apartment in a prestigious development. The property features a large reception room with dining area, fully fitted kitchen with high-end appliances, three double bedrooms (master with en-suite), and two modern bathrooms. Additional benefits include a private balcony, secure parking, and communal gardens.

properties.description: Stunning six-bedroom house, located in a prime location, offering panoramic views...
properties.longDescription: A magnificent six-bedroom residence offering the ultimate in luxury living. The property features a grand entrance hall, three reception rooms, a state-of-the-art kitchen/breakfast room, home cinema, and gym. The first floor comprises six bedroom suites, all with en-suite facilities. The property enjoys panoramic views, landscaped gardens, and a triple garage.
